000000: 0
&You are hereby informed that you are a prohibited immigrant, by virtue of paragraph (K), section 1, Article 6, of the Aliens and Immigration Laws (1952-2014), because of illegal residence, since 1/7/2020 when your permit was cancelled according to Regulation 11(3) of the Aliens and Immigration Regulations. Consequently, I have proceeded with the issuing of deportation and detention orders dated 1/12/2020, against you. A copy of these orders is hereby attached".
